title: PowerPoint Generator

openaiSpec.name: generate_powerpoint_slides

type.description: The type of slide, either 'title_slide' (title-only), 'content_slide' (title and content), 'table_slide' (title with tabular content), or 'chart_slide' (title with chart content).

items.description: A row in the table for 'table_slide'. Each row is an array of strings.

content.description: The content of the slide. For 'title_slide', this is not required. For 'content_slide', it can be a string (paragraph) or an array of strings (list). For 'table_slide', it is an array of rows, where each row is an array of strings.

subtitle.description: The subtitle of the slide, which provides additional information to support the title. Only title_slide has the subtitle.

name.description: The name of the chart series.

labels.description: The labels for the chart (e.g., categories, time periods).

values.description: The values for each label in the chart.

data.description: The chart data. Depending on the type, this can be an array of labels and values.

type.description: The type of chart, either 'pie', 'doughnut', 'bar', or 'line'.

chartContent.description: The chart data for 'chart_slide'. This includes various types of chart data such as pie charts, doughnut charts, bar charts, and line charts.

slides.description: A list of slides, where each slide includes its type, title, and content.

openaiSpec.description: Generate a PowerPoint file and return the URL for downloading it. If the download url is not present in the response, inform the user that the PowerPoint file could not be generated. Prompt the user to verify that the correct plugin server URL is being used.

userSettings.name: pluginServer

overviewMarkdown:
# PowerPoint Generator

This plugin enables users to generate PowerPoint slides quickly and efficiently.

ðŸ‘‰ **It supports**:  
- Multiple **slide layouts** to fit different presentation needs.
- **Tables** and various **charts** (pie, bar, line, doughnut).
- Options to **show/hide footers** with customizable attributes.
- Ability to **customize basic slide attributes**, including font family, font size, background color, etc.

ðŸ‘‰ **Note:** 
- A plugin server must be set up to use this feature. Follow the detailed guide to set up a plugin server on Render: [How to Deploy Plugins Server on Render](https://docs.typingmind.com/plugins/plugins-server/how-to-deploy-plugins-server-on-render)
- The generated PowerPoint files will be automatically removed after one hour.
- The plugin does not yet support image embedding in PowerPoint files.
